abstract: While there has been no big bounce-back in mergers and acquisitions this year, as some bankers predicted, given the depth of the latest recession, flat is the new up, Reuters Breakingviews argues.
snippet: While there has been no big bounce-back in mergers and acquisitions this year, as some bankers predicted, given the depth of the latest recession, flat is the new up, Reuters Breakingviews argues.
lead_paragraph: Some bankers made rosy predictions for a big bounce-back in mergers and acquisitions this year. Yet deal volumes in the United States are recovering as if the recession just endured was run of the mill, Reuters Breakingviews says.

headline.main: In Deal-Making, Flat Is the New Up

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Burlington Northern and Santa Fe Railway
